The doctors said you can handle it on your own at home because:
1. There is no medication or treatment for measles. Wait and see is just about all you can do.

1147689277972799493.text:
Sometimes.

And sometimes it's deadly. Or permanently disabling. Or leads to medical complications later in life.

"Handle it fine" just means there's no cure so it's primarily supportive care while you wait it out.

1147733568417947648.text:
The reason doctors warn against not vaccinating for measles is:
